医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
扩大使用普通抗生素可将撒哈拉以南非洲地区的儿童死亡率降低 14%当加州大学旧金山分校的研究表明，对撒哈拉以南非洲地区的儿童进行常规抗生素治疗可以减少 5 岁以下儿童的死亡率时，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 迅速采取行动推荐这种治疗方法，但仅限于 1 至 11 个月大的婴儿老的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Expanded-use-of-common-antibiotic-cuts-child-mortality-by-1425-in-Sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Expanded-use-of-common-antibiotic-cuts-child-mortality-by-1425-in-Sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33c0bf65-95cd-4684-aeda-d2cccfb30b51 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 00:09:50 -0400 Expanded use of common antibiotic cuts child mortality by 14% in Sub-Saharan Africa
研究挑战偏头痛与帕金森病的联系与之前的研究相反，一项针对女性参与者的新研究发现偏头痛与患帕金森病的风险之间没有联系。该研究于 2024 年 8 月 21 日发表在美国神经病学学会医学杂志 Neurology® 的在线期刊上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Study-challenges-migraine-Parkinsons-connection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Study-challenges-migraine-Parkinsons-connection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fc5c7f2-926e-4883-8fa2-92418a0dd5b0 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 00:04:54 -0400 Study challenges migraine-Parkinson's connection
PGK1 在帕金森病中的关键作用威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员领导的一项临床前研究表明，一种名为 PGK1 的酶在脑细胞化学能的产生中发挥着意想不到的关键作用。研究人员发现，增强其活动可能有助于大脑抵抗可能导致帕金森病的能量不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/The-ritic-role-of-PGK1-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/The-ritic-role-of-PGK1-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfcc8007-279b-491d-a6df-c8057b74630c Wed, 21 Aug 2024 23:53:11 -0400 The critical role of PGK1 in Parkinson's disease
新发现揭示DNA如何调节疾病突变的遗传昆士兰大学的研究人员在 DNA 中发现了一种调节致病突变遗传方式的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/New-discovery-reveals-how-DNA-regulates-inheritance-of-disease-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/New-discovery-reveals-how-DNA-regulates-inheritance-of-disease-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64355e2a-4230-4ffe-90b8-647d89f3e14f Wed, 21 Aug 2024 23:29:00 -0400 New discovery reveals how DNA regulates inheritance of disease mutations
高剂量裸盖菇素显示出与艾司西酞普兰相似的抗抑郁作用今天发表在《英国医学杂志》上的一项系统综述和荟萃分析表明，高剂量的裸盖菇素（迷幻蘑菇中的活性成分）似乎对抑郁症状具有与选择性血清素再摄取抑制剂 (SSRI) 药物艾司西酞普兰相似的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/High-dose-psilocybin-shows-similar-antidepressant-effects-to-escitalopram.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/High-dose-psilocybin-shows-similar-antidepressant-effects-to-escitalopram.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ab30329-dedb-4f1a-bcc7-778afafc6268 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 23:11:00 -0400 High dose psilocybin shows similar antidepressant effects to escitalopram
肠道分子阻止线虫禁食期间的脂肪燃烧对于世界各地的节食者来说，这场斗争可能听起来很熟悉，秀丽隐杆线虫吃得越少，它失去脂肪的速度就越慢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Gut-molecule-blocks-fat-burning-during-fasting-in-C-elegans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Gut-molecule-blocks-fat-burning-during-fasting-in-C-elegans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f346c127-96b5-4ba9-a49e-33767a4d0e96 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 23:06:52 -0400 Gut molecule blocks fat burning during fasting in C. elegans
Belzutifan 有望治疗晚期肾细胞癌LITESPARK-005 3 期临床招募了 746 名转移性透明细胞肾细胞癌 (ccRCC) 患者，这些患者在接受免疫检查点抑制剂 (ICI) 和抗血管生成治疗后病情出现进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Belzutifan-shows-promise-in-treating-advanced-renal-cell-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Belzutifan-shows-promise-in-treating-advanced-renal-cell-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c1fac01-5702-4397-b11c-7c505ded2590 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 23:01:18 -0400 Belzutifan shows promise in treating advanced renal cell carcinoma
大多数婴幼儿食品不符合营养标准美国婴幼儿商业食品的营养和促销概况评估https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Majority-of-infant-and-toddler-foods-fail-to-meet-nutritional-standards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Majority-of-infant-and-toddler-foods-fail-to-meet-nutritional-standards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd9e5022-02d8-499b-9686-8dfb8c039648 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 22:51:00 -0400 Majority of infant and toddler foods fail to meet nutritional standards
卡姆果提取物可减少非酒精性脂肪肝患者的肝脏脂肪拉瓦尔大学的一个研究小组展示了卡姆果对非酒精性脂肪肝的益处，这种疾病影响着加拿大超过 700 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Camu-camu-extract-reduces-liver-fat-in-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Camu-camu-extract-reduces-liver-fat-in-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be706bda-7c05-4d54-a1ea-a700f428a2f2 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 22:44:32 -0400 Camu-camu extract reduces liver fat in non-alcoholic fatty liver disease
ADA 和 Abbott 联手解决糖尿病和肥胖症的营养需求美国糖尿病协会® (ADA) 和雅培最近宣布开展合作，以更好地了解糖尿病、肥胖和代谢功能障碍患者的营养需求，以及营养配方如何支持这些需求和整体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/ADA-and-Abbott-join-forces-to-address-nutritional-needs-in-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/ADA-and-Abbott-join-forces-to-address-nutritional-needs-in-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6adaec27-42c7-4134-a568-a929a2bd4c62 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 22:31:08 -0400 ADA and Abbott join forces to address nutritional needs in diabetes and obesity
